#summary Root page for documentation for pmtk3

= Installation =

Download the pmtk3 and pmktData zip files. Unzip them, say to C:\pmtk3
and C:\pmktData.
Start Matlab/Octave. Then type
{{{
addpath('C:\pmtkData')
cd C:\pmtk3
addpath(genpathPMTK(pwd))
}}}
To test the system, run one of the demos, e.g.,
{{{
logregSATdemo
}}}
